mapper.sql: id, wechat, stu_str, phone, lab_pos, person_identity, user_name
mapper.select:
select * from userinfo where
id = #{id},
wechat = #{wechat},
stu_str = #{stuStr},
phone = #{phone},
lab_pos = #{labPos},
person_identity = #{personIdentity},
user_name = #{userName}
mapper.insert: insert into userinfo (id, wechat, stu_str, phone, lab_pos, person_identity, user_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

stu_str = #{stuStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
